message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $950,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $750,000 for the product.
Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your perspective, but that price point wouldn't be feasible for me.  How about we meet in the middle somewhat? I propose $875,000.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $825,000 for the product.
